title: Ep 469 | Phil Comes Face-to-Face with the Actor Playing Him in a Movie & Why Jase Loves His TV Crew
description:
Phil finally met the actor who will portray him in a new movie about Phil's early life, and Al explains how God is a jealous God. Jase remembers mentor Bill Smith and their discussions about the book of Romans. Jase discusses the relationships and bonds formed with the TV crew he now works with for the filming of his new TV show, "Duck Family Treasure." Phil tells of the actor who will play his old buddy Big Al and shares his journey to faith, and Jase points out that a spiritual war has already been won through the resurrection of Jesus Christ.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://DwellApp.io/Unashamed and get 10% off a yearly subscription, or 33% off Dwell for life
